event.description: Endy Chavez flies out to center fielder B. J. Upton.
Matt Antonelli singles on a ground ball to right fielder Elliot Johnson.
Nick Johnson reaches on force attempt, fielding error by shortstop Reid Brignac. Matt Antonelli to 2nd.
